name: NeurologicalImpairment
title: Neurological Impairment
description: OP-8 is the measure ID associated with the codes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with neurologic impairment.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have neurologic impairment.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with neurologic impairment are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not associated with neurologic impairment are excluded from the value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-9 are also excluded from the value set.)
